## Conditions.ConditionSet.canMatchPartialContext() method

Determines if this condition set can match a supplied context, even if the context is partial. Returns true if all conditions in the set can match the context (using canMatchPartialContext). Returns false otherwise.

**Signature:**

```typescript
canMatchPartialContext(context: Context.IValidatedContextDecl, options?: Context.IContextMatchOptions): boolean;
```

</th><th>

</th><th>

</td><td>

[Context.IValidatedContextDecl](./ts-res.context.ivalidatedcontextdecl.md)


</td><td>

The context to match.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

options


</td><td>

[Context.IContextMatchOptions](./ts-res.context.icontextmatchoptions.md)


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Options to use when matching.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

boolean

`true` if all conditions can match the context, `false` otherwise.
